style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.47%;top: 2.84%;width: 11.58%;height: 6.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.45%;top: 2.84%;width: 8.95%;height: 7.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
私達は数ヶ月
会ってないけど
彼の人柄は
知ってたから
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 39.14%;top: 21.19%;width: 12.65%;height: 8.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
別に寂しく
なかったわ…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.69%;top: 29.49%;width: 10.26%;height: 5.11%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.43%;top: 6.11%;width: 6.44%;height: 3.52%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.20%;top: 9.54%;width: 7.40%;height: 5.62%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
え…いや
リンゴ全然
知らねぇ。
会ったこと
ある？
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81.98%;top: 6.53%;width: 10.62%;height: 9.47%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
何も
思わないの!?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.42%;top: 37.87%;width: 10.86%;height: 5.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
彼は大切に
思ってたのよ君のこと!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37.83%;top: 37.54%;width: 12.77%;height: 6.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 53.58%;top: 41.90%;width: 8.47%;height: 7.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
オレ的には
疑問の余地は
無ぇ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.08%;top: 47.18%;width: 10.14%;height: 7.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
彼はエコーの
誕生会の
晩餐だろう
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 13.25%;top: 60.09%;width: 10.98%;height: 6.79%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ベティがオレに
妙な顔をした。
吸血者なら、
次の標的は
オレもありえた
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.41%;top: 69.06%;width: 13.25%;height: 8.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ビビとベベの
考えは分から
ねぇ…

それと…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 39.50%;top: 60.59%;width: 10.38%;height: 9.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: normal;
